tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Shobana for my first pregnancy.. Initially I was very nervous about the Dr. and had many questions in my mind if I am consulting the right Dr. And all? But as weeks passed I developed a strong trust in Dr Shobana mam.. she is gem of a person and the best Dr. I have ever met.. she addresses each question so patiently and politely and cleared all our doubts during pregnancy..though my 8 months of pregnancy were very smooth  and during 9th month I suffered from bells palsy and she was the one who motivated me and took utmost care of me during that time..she suggested me the next steps and gave me confidence that it will be all fine soon (which actually happened at the end).She was  readily available on calls for any emergency even when she was out of town and also she gave a call from her side to know about  my health and how I was feeling..The trust and respect for Dr. Raman Mam increased to next level when i was in labour room and I have given up twice on normal delivery and requested her for c sec as I was not able to bear the pain.. but only she was the one who motivated me like anything for normal delivery instead of doing c sec.... I saw more than a Dr. in her in the labour room.. more of a mother..more of a friend...just wanted to thank  you enough Dr. through this post..Trust me.. *** ** *** **** *** *** **** **** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Scan,
review:
Dr Raman Shobana is a very professional doctor with a very rich experience. She is very approachable as each consultation in her clinic was very smooth with not much waiting time. Mine was a twin pregnancy hence all the complications related to that was dealt with utmost care and proactively. The way she managed my case is really commendable and clearly depicts her deep knowledge and experience. She understands the mindset of the patient and clarifies all their doubts. Following her advice helped me keep calm through the phase of pregnancy She ensured to take all the required precautions which resulted in a very smooth pregnancy and delivery.

@Dr Shobana:You are an amazing doctor and a wonderful person. Thank you for your support during some really tough times, as well as your encouragement to help me get to the best times in my life. I'm beyond thankful for my twin sons.Words can't say how much I appreciate you but thank you so much for everything!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Amazing Dr.  With handful of experience... she is so calm while dealing with patient and listen and solves your query with perfection... when I asked her I have conceived at the age of 36 for my 2nd child, so will there be any complications? She replied" age is just a number... and I'm here to take care of any complications... you just have good vibes for the baby" and I'm blessed with a second baby boy... the Dr. Is super awesome.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** *** *** *****. She is always available over watsapp, calls. She was friendly yet very straight forward about everything. She encouraged me for a normal delivery. I really thank her for everything because nothing would have been possible without her support.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: It’s been 3 months since my delivery. Though it’s lil late, I didn’t want to stop giving my review. Shobana Mam was there with me throughout my delivery. From my pre pregnancy check up till my post pregnancy check up, she was with me. Whenever I reached for my confusions n problems, she kindly explained everything to us. During my delivery, the whole day she was helping me to get normal delivery. I will never forget that. Thanks a lot Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Really Satisfied with the way she treated me.
I had infertility issue after undergoing treatment with Doctor now I am blessed with a baby now.
Really happy with the treatment monthly check ups without any wait time.......very clear explanation on scan and treatment.

Since my conception till delivery of my baby I was under the treatment of Dr. Raman Shobana and I have an amazing experience with her. She never prescribes unnecessary medication neither force for unnecessary scanning. She speaks point to point and makes things understand Inna very easy manner. **** ****** ** ********** ****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was an excellent experience with Dr.Shobana. I did meet her for a second opinion and scan.  Though she is a bit strict and direct she does not leave you guessing and gives you the correct advise. I continued my follow up with her and delivered a healthy baby boy recently. Best part is when I complained of pain at the midnight, she talked to me and asked me to get admitted. Before I reached the hospital she was already there waiting and the delivery went smooth.Thank you doctor for your support and guidance throughout my pregnancy. I would not think recommending her.

review: **** ************** I highly recommend Dr Raman shobana. I really satisfied with the treatment. I approached her during my pregnancy. She was very friendly. So my pregnancy went very smoothly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted her when I was almost 6 months for my second pregnancy. She was really calm and listen to ur problems. She made sure I have normal delivery in Dec 2019.She was very supportive. Thanks lot Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were anxious when I found out that my wife is pregnent as she had multiple issues earlier. Doctor understood the situation and started monitoring her frequently as pregnancy progress.She is open to discussion and she explains all the situation to us from time to time. She took extra care as my wife previous history of complications.She guided us through the pregnancy and provided all the help needed. Finally ensured that we had a normal delivery.We really owe to Doctor for for that.
